item.title: 日本央行加息后，KKR 仍热衷于购买日本房地产
item.description: 即使日本央行自 2007 年以来首次加息，KKR & Co.也计划继续购买日本的房地产资产。【原文：KKR & Co. plans to keep buying real estate assets in Japan even if the central bank raises interest rates for the first time since 2007.】

item.title: 股市为何不在乎降息
item.description:
首先，我们相信他们终将到来。其次，在 S&P 500 指数中占主导地位的科技巨头的利润如此之高，以至于折扣几乎不重要

。【原文：

First, it’s convinced they’re coming eventually. Second, profits at the tech giants dominating the S&P 500 are so high that the discount barely matters

】

item.title: 监管越多股价越高
item.description:
东京证券交易所要求公司为股东创造更多价值— 而且这一要求正在发挥作用。【原文：

Tokyo’s stock exchange is demanding companies deliver more shareholder value — and it’s working.

】

item.title: 大宗商品被卷入全球波动性空头交易中
item.description: 交易商们正在押注原材料价格的波动，以对抗大宗商品行业历史上声名狼藉的繁荣与萧条。【原文：Traders are betting against volatility in raw materials prices, countering the commodity sector’s notoriously boom-and-bust history.】

item.title: 中国医药股因创新药支持猜测而大涨
item.description: 据猜测，中国政府正在制定一项计划，支持开发世界领先的创新药物，中国医药股因此上涨。【原文：Chinese pharmaceutical stocks rose amid speculation that authorities are working on a plan to support the development of world-leading innovative drugs.】

item.title: 繁忙的二月，曼哈顿公寓租金攀升
item.description: 由于经济强劲和销售市场严峻，2 月份曼哈顿的公寓租金有所上涨。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents rose in February as a strong economy and tough sales market translated into a busy month for leasing.】

item.title: Taylors Wines（泰乐士酒业）表示在中国重建品牌需要付出艰苦努力
item.description: Taylors Wines 预计在中国重建品牌将面临挑战，但这家澳大利亚葡萄酒商已做好准备，一旦惩罚性关税结束，将在未来两三个月内重新进入中国市场。【原文：Taylors Wines foresees challenges in rebuilding its brand in China, but the Australian vintner is ready to re-enter the market over the next two to three months once punitive tariffs come to an end.】

item.title: 印度小盘股暴跌 800 亿美元，闪现警示信号
item.description: 小盘股的大幅回调预示着风险偏好正在削弱更广泛的印度市场，而印度市场在经历了多年的反弹之后，目前在亚太地区表现不佳。【原文：A sharp correction in small-cap stocks portends souring risk appetite on the broader Indian market, which is now an underperformer in Asia Pacific after a multi-year rally.】

item.title: 全球最大的国家养老金--日本 GPIF 准备解除外国股票借贷禁令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本政府养老金投资基金最早将于周五宣布恢复借出外国股票，这是在该基金出人意料地决定停止借出外国股票四年之后。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund will announce as early as Friday that it will resume lending foreign stocks, according to people familiar with the matter, four years after its surprise decision to stop the practice.】

item.title: 韩国私立教育支出再创新高
item.description: 韩国人在私立教育上的支出再创新高，部分原因是对医学院录取的狂热，这进一步加剧了家庭经济的紧张，而家庭经济紧张本已是韩国低生育率的一个关键因素。【原文：South Koreans’ spending on private education hit another record high, driven partly by a frenzy for medical school admission, further straining household finances that are already a key factor behind the nation’s low fertility rate.】

item.title: 日本自民党官员称日本央行加息风险增加财政改革需求
item.description: 执政党自民党的一位资深议员表示，由于日本央行可能最快于下周加息，政府需要整顿财政，以降低金融风险。【原文：With the Bank of Japan likely to hike interest rates as soon as next week, the government needs to gets its fiscal house in order to mitigate financial risks, a senior lawmaker in the ruling Liberal Democratic Party said.】

item.title: 全球市场趋紧，铜价向每吨 9,000 美元迈进
item.description: 由于投资者押注全球市场供应趋紧，铜价涨幅扩大至每吨 9,000 美元，达到 11 个月以来的最高点。【原文：Copper extended gains toward $9,000 a ton, reaching its highest in 11 months, as investors bet on supplies tightening in the global market.】

item.title: 对日元今年反弹的殷切期望让位于微弱涨幅的讨论
item.description: 对日元今年表现优于同类货币的预期几乎消失殆尽，策略师们现在预测日元在2024年年底的表现将在其起点的几个百分点之内。【原文：Expectations for the yen to outperform its peers this year have all but evaporated, with strategists now forecasting the currency to end 2024 within a few percent of where it started.】

item.title: 小盘股领跌，印度股市成为亚洲的落后者
item.description: 印度小盘股的回调预示着整个市场的风险偏好正在减弱，印度股市目前在亚太地区表现不佳。【原文：A correction in India’s small-cap stocks portends souring risk appetite on the broader market, which is now an underperformer in Asia Pacific.】

item.title: 减产迫在眉睫，交易员囤积看涨铜期权
item.description: 交易商周三买入看涨铜期权，押注工业金属的涨势将因可能出现的供应紧张和货币宽松而延续。【原文：Traders bought into bullish copper options Wednesday, betting the industrial metal’s rally will extend on possible supply tightness and monetary easing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚巨型基金控制着 9 万亿美元的养老金
item.description: 未来几十年，随着合并和竞争的加剧，澳大利亚的退休制度将由一批庞大的养老基金主导，只剩下少数几家实力雄厚的投资者。【原文：A group of massive pension funds will dominate Australia’s retirement system in the coming decades as increasing mergers and rivalry leave just a handful of powerhouse investors.】

item.title: 香港考虑缩减台风期间开放股市的计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港正在考虑缩减在最恶劣天气期间开放交易的计划。【原文：Hong Kong is considering scaling back its plans to open up trading during the most severe weather, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 工业燃料需求减弱，中国茶壶炼油厂削减产量
item.description: 中国经济前景不明朗，给生产柴油的炼油厂带来压力，而柴油是中国大部分工业活动的燃料。【原文：China’s uncertain economic prospects are stressing the oil refiners that produce diesel, the fuel that powers much of the country’s industrial activities.】

item.title: 德本汉姆在英国超级基金交易中卸下 6 亿英镑养老金计划
item.description: 四年前倒闭的英国百货连锁店德本汉姆公司（Debenhams Plc）正在转移其养老金债务，这将是英国第二笔养老金超级基金交易。【原文：Debenhams Plc, the British department-store chain that collapsed about four years ago, is transferring its pension obligations in what will be the UK’s second pension superfund deal.】

item.title: 花旗银行东京分行行长预测交易量将在停滞后激增
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）在日本的顶级投资银行家预计，在不久的将来，日本的并购业务将翻一番。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s top investment banker in Japan expects merger business in the country to double in the near future, adding to growing optimism among Wall Street banks after watching the nation’s share of dealflow stagnate for decades.】

item.title: 量子震荡 "后，一些中国基金是如何恢复元气的？
item.description: 中国许多陷入困境的量化基金正在复苏，那些引领复苏的基金坚持使用帮助它们抵御多年市场动荡的计算机模型。【原文：Many of China’s beleaguered quant funds are on the mend, and those leading the recovery stuck with the same computer models that helped them withstand years of market turmoil.】

item.title: 通胀回升有可能破坏亚洲新兴债券的涨势
item.description: 亚洲国家的通胀压力正在恢复，这表明对该地区债券的支持正在减弱。【原文：Asian nations are seeing a revival in inflation pressures, signaling weakening support for the region’s bonds.】

item.title: 黄金是摩根大通最青睐的大宗商品，价格有望达到 2,500 美元
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Gold is the No. 1 pick in commodities markets for JPMorgan Chase & Co. and the price has the potential to reach $2,500 an ounce this year, according to the bank’s global head of commodities research.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。华尔街关注下一个通胀数据。TikTok 在美国的命运仍不明朗。中国承诺由中央政府出资鼓励企业更换老旧设备和商品。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Wall Street zeroes in on the next inflation print. TikTok’s fate in the US remains uncertain. China pledges central government funds to encourage businesses to replace old equipment and goods. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 收购帮助淡马锡支持的医院公司争夺印度市场头把交椅
item.description: Manipal Health Enterprises Pvt.正寻求收购一家规模较小的印度连锁医院，这是该公司自2020年以来的第四次收购，它将推动这家由淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）支持的公司成为印度第一大医疗服务提供商，取代阿波罗医院企业有限公司（Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.）。【原文：Manipal Health Enterprises Pvt. is looking to acquire a smaller India hospital chain — its fourth buyout since 2020 — that can propel the Temasek Holdings Pte-backed firm to being the country’s No. 1 health care provider, toppling Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.】

item.title: 美国库存下降后，石油保持五周来最大涨幅
item.description: 在美国原油库存减少和乌克兰袭击了另一家俄罗斯炼油厂之后，石油保持了约五周以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest gain in about five weeks after US crude stockpiles shrunk and Ukraine attacked another Russian refinery.】

item.title: 中国万科的美元债券预示着未来违约的担忧
item.description: 资金短缺的中国开发商中国万科集团一直在努力避免其首次违约，虽然投资者对其即将崩溃的担忧似乎正在减轻，但其长期前景却不甚明朗。【原文：Cash-strapped Chinese developer China Vanke Co. has been fighting to avoid its first-ever default, and while investors’ fears of an imminent meltdown appear to be easing, its long-term prospects are less clear.】

item.title: 亚洲股市谨慎开盘，原油大涨：市场综述
item.description: 在科技股下跌导致美股小幅下挫之后，亚洲股市周四早盘走势平缓。石油期货因储备意外下降而上涨。【原文：Asian equities were headed for muted moves early Thursday after a drop for technology stocks led to small declines in US shares. Oil futures rose on an unexpected fall in reserves.】

item.title: Reddit 在 IPO 路演中预计 2024 年销售额增长 20% 以上
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的人士透露，Reddit 公司在首次公开募股时告诉潜在投资者，预计 2024 年的营收将比上年增长 20% 以上。【原文：Reddit Inc. is telling potential investors in its initial public offering that it expects revenue in 2024 to grow by more than 20% versus the previous year, according to a person familiar with the situation.】

item.title: S&P下调阿根廷债务互换选择性违约评级
item.description: 在阿根廷争取到足够多的债券持有人将一系列 2024 年到期的本币债券换成期限更长的证券后，该国的地方债务信用评级被下调。【原文：Argentina’s local debt had its credit rating downgraded after the country secured enough bondholders to swap a slew of local currency bonds due in 2024 for longer dated securities.】
